    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-29e0804e-13fd-429f-bdf5-165511b24648 button.colab-df-convert');

      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-29e0804e-13fd-429f-bdf5-165511b24648');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/PyCaret/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/PyCaret/output.renderimages/PyCaret/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');

ÎûúÎç§Ìè¨Î†àÏä§Ìä∏ & Í∑∏Î†àÏù¥ÎîîÏñ∏Ìä∏ Î∂ÄÏä§ÌåÖ & Ï£ºÏÑ±Î∂Ñ Î∂ÑÏÑù

ÎûúÎç§ Ìè¨Î†àÏä§Ìä∏

  • Decision Tree (ÎÇòÎ¨¥ 1Í∞ú)
    • Ïó¨Îü¨Í∞ú Ïã¨Ïùå
    • ÏÉòÌîåÎßÅ
    • Feature Importances
  • ÏòàÏ∏°Ìï¥Ïïº Ìï† ÌñâÏùò Í∞ØÏàò, 100ÎßåÍ∞ú
  • Ïª¨ÎüºÏùò Í∞ØÏàò 200Í∞ú ‚Äì> 100Í∞ú
    • ÎÇòÎ¨¥ 100Í∞úÎ•º Ïã¨Í≥† ÌèâÍ∑†ÏùÑ ÎÇ¥Ïûê
    • ÎÇòÎ¨¥ 1Í∞ú Îãπ Ïª¨ÎüºÏùÑ 10Í∞úÎ°ú
    • T1 mae : 20 / T2 mae : 30 / T3 mae 10, ‚Ä¶.
      • T1 ~ T100 mae : 20
      • feature importances
    • ÏÉòÌîåÎßÅ : Î∂ÄÌä∏Ïä§Ìä∏Îû© ÏÉòÌîå (Î≥µÏõê Ï∂îÏ∂ú)
0.9973541965122431 0.8905151032797809

[0.23167441 0.50039841 0.26792718]

Í∑∏Î†àÏù¥ÎîîÏñ∏Ìä∏ Î∂ÄÏä§ÌåÖ

  • Í≤ΩÏÇ¨ÌïòÍ∞ïÎ≤ïÏùò ÏõêÎ¶¨Î•º Ïù¥Ïö©Ìï®.
  • T1 ~ TN Ï¶ùÍ∞ÄÌïòÎ©¥ÏÑú Ïò§Ï∞®Î•º Î≥¥Ï†ïÌï¥Ï£ºÎ©∞ Ï†ïÌôïÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÎÜíÏûÑ
  • ÎûúÎç§Ìè¨Î†àÏä§Ìä∏ÏôÄÏùò Ï∞®Ïù¥Ï†ê
    • ÎûúÎç§Ìè¨Î†àÏä§Ìä∏Îäî Í∞Å ÎÇòÎ¨¥Í∞Ñ ÏÉÅÌò∏ Ïó∞Í¥ÄÏÑ± ÏóÜÏùå
    • Î∂ÄÏä§ÌåÖÏùÄ Í∞Å ÎÇòÎ¨¥Í∞Ñ ÏÉÅÌò∏ Ïó∞Í¥ÄÏÑ± ÏûàÏùå
  • Îã®Ï†ê
    • ÏÜçÎèÑÍ∞Ä ÎÑàÎ¨¥ ÎäêÎ†§Ïöî
  • ÎåÄÏïà
    • XGBoost, LightGBM
0.8881086892152563 0.8720430147331015

  • ÌäπÏÑ± Ï§ëÏöîÎèÑ
[0.15872278 0.68010884 0.16116839]

p318

Ï£ºÏÑ±Î∂Ñ Î∂ÑÏÑù

  • Ïù¥Î°†Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ïñ¥Î†§ÏõÄ
  • Ï¢åÌëúÍ≥Ñ Í≥µÍ∞Ñ Í∞úÎÖê
  • ÏßÅÍµê + ÌöåÏ†Ñ
  • Í≥µÎ∂ÑÏÇ∞ Îì±(ÌÜµÍ≥ÑÍ¥ÄÎ†®ÎÇ¥Ïö©)
  • Feature Engineering Í∏∞Î≤ï
  • StandardScaler()
  • ÌòÑ MLÏùò Î¨∏Ï†úÏ†ê : Ïª¨ÎüºÏùò Í∞ØÏàò Îß§Ïö∞ ÎßéÏùå
  • Ï∞®ÏõêÏ∂ïÏÜå
  • ÌäπÏÑ±Ïù¥ ÎßéÏúºÎ©¥ ÌõàÎ†®Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Ïóê ÏâΩÍ≤å Í≥ºÎåÄÏ†ÅÌï©ÎêúÎã§
  • ÌäπÏÑ±ÏùÑ Ï§ÑÏó¨ÏÑú ÌïôÏäµÎ™®Îç∏Ïùò ÏÑ±Îä•ÏùÑ Ìñ•ÏÉÅÏãúÌÇ®Îã§
  • Î™®Îç∏Ïùò ÌïôÏäµÏãúÍ∞ÑÏùÑ Í∞êÏÜåÏãúÏºúÏ§ÄÎã§
  • ÎåÄÌëúÏ†ÅÏù∏ Î∞©Î≤ïÎ°† Ï§ë ÌïòÎÇòÍ∞Ä PCA, EFA
  • PCA vs EFA
  • EFA(ÌÉêÏÉâÏ†Å ÏöîÏù∏ Î∂ÑÏÑù), Factor Analysis
  • Ïòà) Íµ≠Ïñ¥, ÏàòÌïô, Í≥ºÌïô, ÏòÅÏñ¥
  • Ïòà) Íµ≠Ïñ¥40, ÏàòÌïô100, Í≥ºÌïô100, ÏòÅÏñ¥30 / ÏúÑ ÌïôÏÉùÏùÄ Ïñ∏Ïñ¥ÏòÅÏó≠ÏùÄ ÏàòÏ§ÄÏù¥ ÎÇÆÏùÄ Ìé∏Ïù¥ÎÇò ÏàòÎ¶¨ÏòÅÏó≠ÏùÄ Îß§Ïö∞ ÏàòÏ§ÄÏù¥ ÎÜíÏäµÎãàÎã§
  • Ïòà) Î≤îÏ£ºÌòï & ÏàòÏπòÎç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞
  • PCA(Ï£ºÏÑ±Î∂ÑÎ∂ÑÏÑù)
  • Ïû•ÎπÑ1, Ïû•ÎπÑ2, Ïû•ÎπÑ3, Ïû•ÎπÑ4, ‚Ä¶.
  • PC1, PC2, PC3, ‚Ä¶.PCN
  • ÏõêÎûò Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÎçò Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Ïïå Ïàò ÏóÜÏùå(Ï†ïÎ≥¥ÏÜêÏã§)
  • Î≤îÏ£ºÌòï Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ÏÖãÏóêÎäî ÏÇ¨Ïö© ÏïàÎê®
  • Î¨¥Ï°∞Í±¥ ÏàòÏπòÌòï Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ÏóêÎßå ÏÇ¨Ïö©

  <script>
    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-608990b6-164e-4c58-b650-84617bfdd0a0 button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-608990b6-164e-4c58-b650-84617bfdd0a0');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/0704/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/0704/output.renderimages/0704/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

ÌïòÏù¥Ìçº ÌååÎùºÎØ∏ÌÑ∞ ÌäúÎãù

  • Í∑∏Î¶¨Îìú ÏÑúÏπò (Ïö©Ïñ¥Í∏∞Ïñµ)
  • ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏù¥ ÏàòÎèôÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏûÖÎ†•
  • Max_Depth:[1,3,7]
  • ÎûúÎç§ ÏÑúÏπò (Ïö©Ïñ¥Í∏∞Ïñµ)
  • ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏù¥ Î≤îÏúÑÎßå ÏßÄÏ†ï
  • Max_Depth: 1-10 / by random
  • Î≤†Ïù¥ÏßÄÏïà ÏòµÌã∞ÎßàÏù¥Ï†úÏù¥ÏÖò
  • ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏùò Í∞úÏûÖ ÏóÜÏù¥ ÌïòÏù¥Ìçº ÌååÎùºÎØ∏ÌÑ∞ ÌäúÎãùÏùÑ ÏûêÎèôÏúºÎ°ú ÏàòÌñâÌïòÎäî Í∏∞Ïà†ÏùÑ AutoMLÏù¥ÎùºÍ≥† ÌïúÎã§
  • Ïòà)PyCaret
  • Í∞Å Î™®Îç∏ÎßàÎã§ Ï†ÅÍ≤åÎäî 1-2Í∞úÏóêÏÑú , ÎßéÍ≤åÎäî 5-6Í∞úÏùò Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌïúÎã§
  • XGBoost 100Í∞ú‚Ä¶.?
  • ÌïòÏù¥ÌçºÌååÎùºÎØ∏ÌÑ∞ÏôÄ ÎèôÏãúÏóê ÍµêÏ∞®Í≤ÄÏ¶ùÏùÑ ÏàòÌñâ
  • ÎØ∏ÏπúÏßì

ÍµêÏ∞®Í≤ÄÏ¶ù 5Î≤à
ÍµêÏ∞®Í≤ÄÏ¶ù 1Ìöå Ïã§ÌñâÏãú Max Depth 3Î≤à Ï†ÅÏö©

  • Ï¥ù Í≤∞Í¥èÍ∞í 3 X 5 ÎÇòÏò®Îã§

  • Max Depth = 1,3,7

  • Criterion = gini, entropy

    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-76aa0f66-ffe7-4987-a45c-016731eef719 button.colab-df-convert');

      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-76aa0f66-ffe7-4987-a45c-016731eef719');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.output.renderOutput(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }

ÌëúÏ§ÄÌôî Ï†ÑÏ≤òÎ¶¨

  • ÏõêÎ≥∏ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÌèâÍ∑† ÎåÄÏπò (x) > ÌõàÎ†® Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î°ú ÌèâÍ∑†ÎåÄÏπò (o)
  • ÌõàÎ†® Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ÏôÄ ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Î∂ÑÎ¶¨
  • Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÎàÑÏàò(Data Leakage)
  • ÌõàÎ†®Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÌèâÍ∑†Í∞í 70ÏùÑ ÎåÄÏπò (o)

Ï∞∏Í≥† ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏
https://scikit-learn.org/stable/common_pitfalls.html

Ï∞∏Í≥† ÏΩîÎìú (Î¨¥Ï°∞Í±¥ pipeline ÏúºÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©: Ï§ëÍ∞ÑÏóê Î≥µÏû°Ìïú ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏóÜÏù¥ ÏïàÏ†ÑÌïòÍ≤å Ïã§ÌñâÍ∞ÄÎä•) : Data Leakage Î∞©ÏßÄÍ∞ÄÎä•

from sklearn.pipeline import make_pipeline

model = make_pipeline(StandardScaler(), LinearRegression())

model.fit(X_train, y_train)

Pipeline(steps=[(‚Äòstandardscaler‚Äô, StandardScaler()),
(‚Äòlinearregression‚Äô, LinearRegression())])

mean_squared_error(y_test, model.predict(X_test))
0.90‚Ä¶

  • Pipelines also help avoiding another common pitfall: leaking the test data into the training data.

ÍµêÏû¨ÏóêÎäî Í¥ÄÎ†® ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏóÜÏùå

ÌèâÍ∞Ä ÏßÄÌëú (Ïã§Ï†ú ÌèâÍ∞ÄÏãú Ïù¥Ïö©)

  • ÌöåÍ∑Ä ÌèâÍ∞ÄÏßÄÌëú
  • Í≤∞Ï†ï Í≥ÑÏàò (p121)
  • (ÌÉÄÍπÉ-ÏòàÏ∏°)^2Ïùò Ìï© / (ÌÉÄÍπÉ-ÌèâÍ∑†)^2Ïùò Ìï©
  • MAE, MSE, RMSE
  • (Ïã§Ï†ú - ÏòàÏ∏°)= Ïò§Ï∞®
  • MAE(Mean Absoluted Error) : Ïò§Ï∞®Ïùò Ï†àÎåìÍ∞íÏùò ÌèâÍ∑†
  • MES(Meen Squared Error) : Ïò§Ï∞® Ï†úÍ≥±Ïùò ÌèâÍ∑†
  • RMSE(Root Mean Squared Error):MSEÏóê Ï†úÍ≥±Í∑ºÏùÑ Ï∑®Ìïú Í∞í
  • Ï¢ãÏùÄ Î™®Îç∏Ïù¥ÎûÄ?
  • Í≤∞Ï†ïÍ≥ÑÏàò : 1Ïóê ÏàòÎ†¥ÌïòÎ©¥ Ï¢ãÏùÄ Î™®Îç∏
  • MAE, MSE, RMSE : 0Ïóê ÏàòÎ†¥ÌïòÎ©¥ Ï¢ãÏùÄ Î™®Îç∏

Ï∞∏Í≥†
https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/model_evaluation.html

0.5384615384615384
0.6923076923076923
0.8320502943378437
0.8617021276595744

Î∂ÑÎ•ò ÌèâÍ∞Ä ÏßÄÌëú

  • Ïò§Ï∞® ÌñâÎ†¨
  • Ïã§Ï†ú Í∞í
  • [ÎπôÏñ¥, ÎèÑÎØ∏, ÎèÑÎØ∏, ÎπôÏñ¥, ÎèÑÎØ∏]
  • [ÎπôÏñ¥, ÎπôÏñ¥, ÎèÑÎØ∏, ÎπôÏñ¥, ÎπôÏñ¥]

TP(ÎπôÏñ¥Î•º ÎπôÏñ¥Î°ú ÏòàÏ∏°) : 2
TN(ÎèÑÎØ∏Î•º ÎèÑÎØ∏Î°ú ÏòàÏ∏°) : 1
FN(Ïã§Ï†ú ÎèÑÎØ∏, ÏòàÏ∏° ÎπôÏñ¥) : 2
FP(Ïã§Ï†ú ÎπôÏñ¥, ÏòàÏ∏° ÎèÑÎØ∏) : 0

  • TP, TN, FP, FN
  • TP=5, TN=5, FP=3, FN=7
  • Ï†ïÌôïÎèÑ :(TP+TN)/(TP+TN+FP+FN)
  • Ï†ïÎ∞ÄÎèÑ : ÏñëÏÑ±Ïù¥ÎùºÍ≥† ÏòàÏ∏°Ìïú Í∞í(TP+FP)Ï§ë Ïã§Ï†ú ÏñëÏÑ±Ïù∏ Í∞íÏùò ÎπÑÏú®
  • Ïû¨ÌòÑÏú® : Ïã§Ï†ú ÏñëÏÑ±Ïù∏ Í∞í Ï§ëÏóêÏÑú ÏñëÏÑ±ÏúºÎ°ú ÏòàÏ∏°Ìïú Í∞í(TP)Ïùò ÎπÑÏú®
    • ÏΩîÎ°úÎÇòÍ≤ÄÏÇ¨
    • ÏñëÏÑ±(1) : ÏùåÏÑ±(99)
    • Î®∏Ïã†Îü¨Îãù Î™®Ìòï : Ï†ïÌôïÎèÑ 98% / Ï†ïÎ∞ÄÎèÑ 99%
    • Ïù∏Í∞Ñ ÏùåÏÑ±ÏßÑÎã® : Ï†ïÌôïÎèÑ 99% / Ï†ïÎ∞ÄÎèÑ 95%
  • Í≤ÄÏÇ¨ÏûêÍ∞Ä Ïã§Ï†úÎäî ÏñëÏÑ±, ÏßÑÎã®ÏùÄ ÏùåÏÑ±ÏúºÎ°ú ÎÇ¥Î¶º
  • Î°úÍ∑∏ÏÜêÏã§
  • ROC Curve (=AUC)

  • Ï†ïÎ∞ÄÎèÑ, Ïû¨ÌòÑÏú® : ÌÉÄÍπÉÎç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Í∞Ä Î∂àÏïàÏ†ïÏãú/ Ï†ïÌôïÎèÑ ÌôïÏù∏Ïñ¥Î†§Ïö∏Ïãú

  • Î™®ÌòïÏùò Ï†ïÌôïÎèÑ 3/5 = 60%

Î∂ÑÎ•ò Î™®Îç∏ ÌèâÍ∞ÄÎ∞©Î≤ï Ï∞∏Í≥†

pandas & numpy

ÎùºÏù¥Î∏åÎü¨Î¶¨ Î∂àÎü¨Ïò§Í∏∞

pandas version: 1.3.5
numpy version: 1.21.6

Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Î∂àÎü¨Ïò§Í∏∞

      const element = document.querySelector('#df-9290165e-8ef6-46f3-aac5-16d67164dc30');
      const dataTable =

      if (!dataTable) return;

        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.output.renderOutput(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);

Date Location Lemon Orange Temperature Leaflets Price Sold Revenue
0 7/1/2016 Park 97 67 70 90.0 0.25 164 41.00
1 7/2/2016 Park 98 67 72 90.0 0.25 165 41.25
2 7/3/2016 Park 110 77 71 104.0 0.25 187 46.75
3 7/4/2016 Beach 134 99 76 98.0 0.25 233 58.25
4 7/5/2016 Beach 159 118 78 135.0 0.25 277 69.25 

  <script>
    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-6161dcd9-ff28-4df5-a237-49a77b1964fe button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-6161dcd9-ff28-4df5-a237-49a77b1964fe');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.output.renderOutput(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

  • p.45

Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏàòÏßë

Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Í∞ÄÍ≥µ

  • Ïó¨Í∏∞ÏÑúÎäî ÏÉùÎûµ

Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏãúÍ∞ÅÌôî

  • Ïó¨Îü¨ Ïù∏ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏ ÌôïÏù∏ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏãúÍ∞ÅÌôî, ÌÜµÍ≥Ñ ÏàòÏπò Í≥ÑÏÇ∞
  • ÌÉêÏÉâÏ†Å ÏûêÎ£å Î∂ÑÏÑù(EDA : Exploratory Data Analysis)
  • ÏñòÎäî Ï∞∏Í≥†Îßå ÌïúÎã§.

  • Ï∫êÍ∏Ä ÏãúÍ∞ÅÌôî, Ï∞∏Í≥†Ìï† Îïå, ÏïÑÎûòÏôÄ Í∞ôÏù¥ ÌïòÎäî Î∂ÑÎì§Ïù¥ ÎßéÏùå

ÌåêÎã§Ïä§10Î∂ÑÏôÑÏÑ± & 10 minutes to pandas

1.Object Creation (Í∞ùÏ≤¥ ÏÉùÏÑ±)

    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-297c6298-2b0c-44b9-ade5-7892dee2cea8 button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-297c6298-2b0c-44b9-ade5-7892dee2cea8');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

3. Selection (ÏÑ†ÌÉù)

  • Getting (Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏñªÍ∏∞)
2013-01-01    0.537168
2013-01-02   -1.417607
2013-01-03   -0.826768

A B C D
2013-01-01 0.537168 -1.522940 0.831195 3.560677
2013-01-02 -1.417607 0.740138 -0.305933 0.790458
2013-01-03 -0.826768 -0.326569 -0.690893 -0.247819 

  <script>
    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-53514ae2-a33d-4790-a8fd-4e08e10b0a08 button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-53514ae2-a33d-4790-a8fd-4e08e10b0a08');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

      const element = document.querySelector('#df-7b520ef6-15cd-43ef-8f87-610f8166fda3');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

      document.querySelector('#df-34965406-0604-4737-9cd4-38ee2e8abb6a button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-34965406-0604-4737-9cd4-38ee2e8abb6a');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

first second

13. Gotchas (Ïû°ÏïòÎã§!)

  • ÏòàÏô∏ ÏÉÅÌô©
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)

<ipython-input-120-5c782b38cd2f> in <module>()
----> 1 if pd.Series([False, True, False]):
      2     print("I was true")


/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/pandas/core/generic.py in __nonzero__(self)
   1536     def __nonzero__(self):
   1537         raise ValueError(
-> 1538             f"The truth value of a {type(self).__name__} is ambiguous. "
   1539             "Use a.empty, a.bool(), a.item(), a.any() or a.all()."
   1540         )


ValueError: The truth value of a Series is ambiguous. Use a.empty, a.bool(), a.item(), a.any() or a.all().

I was not None

10 minutes to pandas

  • https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/user_guide/10min.html
0    1.0
1    3.0
2    5.0
3    NaN
4    6.0
5    8.0
dtype: float64

DatetimeIndex(['2013-01-01', '2013-01-02', '2013-01-03', '2013-01-04',
               '2013-01-05', '2013-01-06'],
              dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq='D')

A B C D
2013-01-01 -0.447205 -1.415499 0.415436 -0.419206
2013-01-02 0.076054 -0.881634 0.714701 0.968511
2013-01-03 1.220431 -0.611936 -0.001862 -0.805442
2013-01-04 0.179720 -0.353615 0.148686 -0.941105
2013-01-05 0.017490 -1.024891 0.062566 -1.657465
2013-01-06 1.163262 -0.684634 0.544150 0.061399

A B C D E F
0 1.0 2013-01-02 1.0 3 test foo
1 1.0 2013-01-02 1.0 3 train foo
2 1.0 2013-01-02 1.0 3 test foo
3 1.0 2013-01-02 1.0 3 train foo 

  <script>
    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-0f29422f-b2ad-4552-a41a-e33dac0c4673 button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-0f29422f-b2ad-4552-a41a-e33dac0c4673');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

B    datetime64[ns]
C           float32
D             int32
E          category
F            object

  <script>
    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-f23d83ba-c33c-4a79-a5a2-6ebc173fe829 button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-f23d83ba-c33c-4a79-a5a2-6ebc173fe829');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>

  <script>
    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-248c5bb5-2400-41de-ad5e-161b505086ef button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-248c5bb5-2400-41de-ad5e-161b505086ef');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>
  • Excel

1000 rows √ó 5 columns

  <script>
    const buttonEl =
      document.querySelector('#df-b7865aa5-afde-464d-bc5e-105377ee72ec button.colab-df-convert');
    buttonEl.style.display =
      google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';

    async function convertToInteractive(key) {
      const element = document.querySelector('#df-b7865aa5-afde-464d-bc5e-105377ee72ec');
      const dataTable =
        await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',
                                                 [key], {});
      if (!dataTable) return;

      const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +
        '<a target="_blank" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'
        + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';
      element.innerHTML = '';
      dataTable['images/pandas0628/output_type'] = 'display_data';
      await google.colab.images/pandas0628/output.renderimages/pandas0628/output(dataTable, element);
      const docLink = document.createElement('div');
      docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;
      element.appendChild(docLink);
    }
  </script>
</div>
